column4: I'm trying to share files over a network between Oneiric and Win7. I installed "system-config-samba" but when I click the program it does not run.
you can share folders using nautilus
I have tried going through "Network" but when I try to open WORKGROUP it fails.
is that to connect to shares on win7?
is there a firewall in the way?
I will check my firewall on Win7. truf: I'm trying to access Win7 from Oneiric
if you run:  smbtree    do you see the share?
try pressing ALT+F2 and run:  smb://servername/sharename
if you run: smbtree    do you see the shares. What version of Windows is the sharer?
I do see the share. It is Windows 7.
yeah win7 is an ass. There is a guy reporting on how its a nightmare as well as a fix. I had the link a while back. Let me search
do you use windows live messenger?
